data.eml:eml: A taxonomic review of the genus Astrohelix Döderlein, 1930 including the synonymy of the subgenus Asteroporpa (Astromoana) Baker, 1980 to Astrohelix

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Okanishi, Masanori (2017): A taxonomic review of the genus Astrohelix Döderlein, 1930 including the synonymy of the subgenus Asteroporpa (Astromoana) Baker, 1980 to Astrohelix. Zootaxa 4227 (4): 543-553, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4227.4.4
